ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A run of luck
ygData.msgSnippet: Head: Executioner Hood (want to replace this with a Froglock or Trannix crown) Chest: Enamalled Black chestplate Legs: Black Chitin Legs Feet: Charred Boots
ygData.messageBody:
Head: Executioner Hood (want to replace this with a Froglock or Trannix
crown)
Chest: Enamalled Black chestplate
Legs: Black Chitin Legs
Feet: Charred Boots
Arms: Blacked Iron Armplates (back chain, no black plate arms exist for
non-Sks AFAIK)
Wrist: Serpentine Bracer, it kind of spoils the look. I need to get a
granite bracer (off Petrifin, a spawn in Rathe Mtns. I hate camping Rathe
Mtn rares).
Hands: Guantlets of Fiery Might. Charred guantlets are easier to get for
this spot.

Rokenn





-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 11:56 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A run of luck


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> Last night in PoA I had one of my guild members ask me to put on my plane
> armor so they could take a screen shot (my current look is all black
plate).
> I sadly informed her my only piece of plane equipment (after nearly 2
months
> at 46+) is my Six Note Blade. She was apalled :)

I'm working on my full black plate too.

What pieces are you using?

So far I have: Opoline Helm, Charred BP + gloves + boots

I suppose I need those black chitlin legs, but what arm/wrist gear?

I guess you could go with azure sleeves and bracers that were silver.
Ugh, then I'd look like a freakin dark paladin ;-)

Harmonic.
